org.cougaar.util.log.log4j
Class StreamCapture

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.PrintStream
              org.cougaar.util.log.log4j.StreamCapture
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public final class StreamCapture
extends java.io.PrintStream

This class is used by the SocketAppender to redirect stdout/stdout the logger stream.
